name: Auctionbidmart
overview:
Auctionbidmart is a network of auction, asset recovery, and liquidation partners throughout the United States. We have over 10,000 subscribed buyers ready to pick up, dispose of or resell used computers, used Cisco and network equipment in large lots nationwide.

We specialize in Cisco routers and used Cisco switches. Sell your surplus or signup to buy pre-owned high-end network equipment and refurbished Cisco equipment.

Auctionbidmart computer information technology auctioneers offer business-to-business computer auction, asset recovery and network liquidation services nationwide. Our online auction marketplace brings together a global audience of technology sellers and buyers, guaranteeing a profitable maximum return on surplus assets.

Our auction company made-up of computer buyers, sellers and asset recovery partners specializing in used computer and network hardware. Our IT liquidation partnerships (nationwide liquidators, asset recovery companies, recyclers and auction houses), through a cooperative effort, set bids, buy and sell computer hardware products, by utilizing the online channels we offer. Our clients include businesses, large enterprises, manufacturers, government, financial and educational institutions.

Our network hardware dealers, exporters, OEM suppliers & service companies give us an upper advantage in better serving clients looking for fair surplus pricing on used computer high tech assets. Our business only auction, technology liquidation, sale and asset valuation services are designed for the immediate disposal of surplus computer, electronic and network equipment hassle free.
